author: shawnmdo
title: Fun
review: I was skeptical at first, but these X-Pod sets are awesome. A lot of fun in a small package. Great for travel and building on the go. Instructions for 3 models and whatever you can imagine. A lot of fun!!

author: ratz
title: small but significant
review: being a big fan of the x-pods, there's nothing bad to say about this set. a clever little car, excellent part selection (1x1 slopes!). ok, the alternative models are not the best i've seen, but what can you come up with, if there are just 56 small parts? again, a lovely set, i'd like to see more x-pods!

author: hustla187
title: Here in my Car
review: X-pods were a very interesting series and this one I think is probably the best out of all of them. I like the use of red and orange pieces in this set and you can make alot of automobiles with this set. It is probably the best of the X-pod series.

author: bmwlego
title: Orange and Red Cheese Slopes
review:
This is a wonderful X-Pod set. This set makes me wish there were more of these being produced still. The selection is great for car builders but those of us who love creating with the cheese slope love this set because there are 6 red and 2 orange cheese slopes. The slope brick for the windshield is one of my favorite pieces as well. I have used it for a go-kart MOC. The color scheme is pleasing to the eye. I would have loved to see this set produced in other colors (green with lime accents, blue with dark  blue accents). I have 3 X-Pods and this is my favorite. Check out my Go-Karts on my brickshelf gallery:
http://www.brickshelf.com/cgi-bin/gallery.cgi?f=245773


Let me know what you think about my Go-Karts.
